code: @Override public Source resolve(String href, String base) throws TransformerException {     InputStream stream = ClassPathURIResolver.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(rulesDir.concat("/").concat(href)).     if (stream != null) {         return new StreamSource(stream).     } else {         if (clientUriResolver != null) {             return clientUriResolver.resolve(href, base).         } else {             return new StreamSource(stream).         }     } }
